title: Chamber of Benediction
description: This sacred chamber radiates a calm and radiant warmth, its marble floor inlaid with golden sigils and concentric circles of divine scripture. At the far end stands a raised dais upon which the cleric guildmaster delivers sermons and oversees training. Incense smoke curls upward toward a high vaulted ceiling, where stained glass panels filter soft multicolored light into divine patterns across the room. Padded prayer mats and ritual implements are neatly arranged, and the air carries a subtle hum of divine energy. This is where initiates are tested, healed, and guided into deeper mysteries of their calling.

east.description: An arched passageway leads back east into the main hall of the Cleric's Guild.

extra_descriptions.description: The elevated platform is adorned with silver symbols of healing and judgment, polished smooth by years of sermons and blessings.
Golden sigils encircle the floor, forming divine wards and blessings against evil.
Each pane portrays a different divine figure bestowing light upon kneeling followers.
